topicTitle: Epic Traitor Round of all time

posts.postText:
Okay, so i was T on LostTemple, and i killed 8 people in the first minute of the round with a silenced psitol. AWesome
Of course it is.

If you have nothing constructive to add then don't say anything. 

Any way. Wheatley how many did you kill with a knife or betrayl

Shoulda taken screenshots, Wheat.  Then you could wave e-peen swag all over the place.  But you really did kill 8 people with the silenced pistol?  That alone is a nice achievement, and if the time you stated is true, even better.  Congratulations I guess :V
I imagine all these kills took place with afks... or at least in the afk trap zone.

I've killed more than 8 people in the blnk of an eye before.
 I used C4, it's obvious, no need to post it.

Nope, none AFKJ and no knives or betrayals. I just bought a pistol and just started shooting from the lil scaffolding becuase people kept flooding in the check the bodies every second. Then i jumped down and got two more :3
And i have screenshots of it, i jsut didnt post them, you can check my G-mod screenshot gallery though to see for yourself.

Edit: Although the Traitors still lost, becuase my other teammates were some random joiners who didnt know what to do, hence why i only felt liek using silenced pistol.
Lol I have also gotten a bunch of kills with the silenced pistol on that map
I would like to care, but ive had more funnier and more epic rounds.
Good sir, if you would like to wave your Ego on NNJG, go make your own thread :p
